channel.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
channel.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

image.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
image.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

item.title: Indigenous survivors pursue justice at genocide trial in Guatemala
item.description: Former army chief Manuel Benedicto Lucas Garcia is being tried for genocide and crimes against humanity in Guatemala.

item.title: Gaza’s children face long road to healing
item.description: Experts decry psychological damage from lack of schooling coupled with bombings, hunger, sickness and bereavement.

item.title: US’s Yellen warns China it cannot export its way to rapid growth
item.description: US treasury secretary says market-based reforms will aid world's second largest economy.

item.title: Israel’s war on Gaza: List of key events, day 182
item.description: US President Biden pressed Israeli PM Netanyahu to implement concrete steps to protect civilians in Gaza.

item.title: McDonald’s buys all 225 of Israeli franchise restaurants after boycotts
item.description: McDonald's subject to boycotts since franchisee Alonyal announced it would give free meals to the Israeli military.

item.title: How dubious YouTube ‘news’ channels are shaping India’s election
item.description: In YouTube's largest market, self-proclaimed news channels are booming, gaining millions of viewers peddling falsehoods.

item.title: Taiwan searches for 18 still missing after Wednesday’s earthquake
item.description: Strict building codes and widespread public disaster awareness appear to have staved off a major catastrophe.

item.title: Trump says Israel ‘losing PR war’ in Gaza, should finish war ‘fast’
item.description: Former US President criticises Israel for releasing 'most heinous' videos of air strikes in Gaza.

item.title: At Indonesia’s biggest bank, customers’ savings can vanish with a click
item.description: Indonesians robbed of their savings in cyber scams report little relief from banks or authorities.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 771
item.description: As the war enters its 771st day, these are the main developments.

item.title: No Labels group abandons US presidential third-party bid
item.description: The group said it aimed to offer an alternative to hyper-partisan politics, but it failed to find an election champion.

item.title: US judges reject Trump’s attempt to dismiss charges in two criminal cases
item.description: Trump has sought to dismiss cases accusing him of election interference in Georgia and of mishandling classified files.

item.title: Rights advocates demand end to Haiti deportations as unrest continues
item.description: IOM says 13,000 people were forcibly returned to Haiti by neighbouring countries last month despite a surge in violence.

item.title: Is the world focused enough on climate change?
item.description: There are fears that wars in Gaza and Ukraine may deflect attention from the climate crisis.

item.title: Peru’s President Boluarte avoids impeachment effort over Rolex watch probe
item.description: Boluarte replaced impeached President Pedro Castillo in a country where 'moral incapacity' ousters have become common.

item.title: Israel boosts defences after Iran consulate attack in Syria
item.description: The Israeli army says it 'strengthened the alertness of combat units' after attack on Iranian consulate in Damascus.

item.title: Biden presses Netanyahu for steps to protect civilians in Gaza: White House
item.description: US president has criticised Israeli conduct in Gaza war but says he 'strongly supports Israel' against Iran 'threat'.

item.title: Taiwan earthquake rescues
item.description: Hundreds of tourists have been located safely in Taiwan, a day after a 7.2 magnitude earthquake struck the island.

item.title: Will the US unemployment rate continue at historic lows?
item.description: US job growth has continued at a steady clip in months since COVID pandemic, but experts are looking for warning signs.

item.title: Myanmar anti-coup forces claim ‘success’ in Naypyidaw drone attack
item.description: About 30 drones were used in the attack on the remote capital, the stronghold of the military regime.

item.title: Denmark missile launcher fault closes busy shipping strait
item.description: Denmark's National Maritime Authority warns ships not to sail through the Great Belt strait.

item.title: Diplomatic spat erupts between Poland and Israel after WCK killings in Gaza
item.description: Israel's ambassador has sparked outrage for accusing Poles of anti-Semitism following the killing of seven aid workers.

item.title: Why I’m protesting against my Israeli government | Close Up
item.description: Gil Dickmann’s aunt was killed on October 7. His cousin is a captive. He's leading the charge against Israel’s Gaza war.

item.title: Are Modi’s economic policies benefitting all Indians?
item.description: India is the world's fifth-largest economy. The World Bank says the nation is leading growth in South Asia.

item.title: Pedro Sanchez: Championing Gaza ceasefire and Palestine statehood
item.description: Spain's prime minister says Netanyahu's strategy leads to international isolation as Gaza death toll rises.
